data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heleodoro, Raphael Aquino, Mendes, Diego Matheus De Mello (2016): Description of a new species of Lutosa Walker, 1869 (Orthoptera: Anostostomatidae: Lutosinae) from the Brazilian Atlantic Forest, with biological and behavioral information. Zootaxa 4189 (2): 387-394, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.2.12|1 occurrence
